keyMoments.title: Discovery of Underground Ruins
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates fall into underground ruins on Lost Island, where they discover ancient paintings that help solve the mystery of the Dragon's Nest.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's exploration leads to the critical revelation about the Dragon's Nest location.

keyMoments.title: Solving the Dragon's Nest Mystery
keyMoments.description: Through Nami's deduction, the Straw Hats solve the central mystery of the arc, learning that the Dragon's Nest is at Warship Island.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery allows the crew to help Apis and Ryu complete their mission.

keyMoments.title: Escaping the Ruins
keyMoments.description: The crew escapes from the ruins on a cart with Apis and Ryu while Zoro holds off Eric, demonstrating their teamwork and dedication to helping their friends.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's commitment to protecting Apis and Ryu despite the danger from Eric and the Marines.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
